body_html: Sorry, I don't quite understand why you need to add an identity there -- these ops have some early exit paths, so sometimes, you will not create a new name scope at all and return the original. Is that what you meant? You are suggesting to add an identity in that case? Since in those cases, the function doesn't create graphs, I think it is sensible to not add a name scope either. I like this as is.

body: Sorry, I don't quite understand why you need to add an identity there -- these ops have some early exit paths, so sometimes, you will not create a new name scope at all and return the original. Is that what you meant? You are suggesting to add an identity in that case? Since in those cases, the function doesn't create graphs, I think it is sensible to not add a name scope either. I like this as is.
